scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none VITE_IS_ELECTRON=true npm run dev -- -c vite.config.electron.js" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:dev:remote: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none VITE_IS_ELECTRON=true VITE_DATA_MODE=remote npm run dev -- -c vite.config.electron.js" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: cross-env VITE_IS_ELECTRON=true vite build -c vite.config.electron.js && electron-builder
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open android
scripts.electron:build:remote: cross-env VITE_IS_ELECTRON=true VITE_DATA_MODE=remote vite build -c vite.config.electron.js && electron-builder
scripts.cap:sync:remote: npm run build:remote && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:android:remote: npm run cap:sync:remote && npx cap open android
